channel.title: VAST News on VAST | Visualization and Analysis Software and Technology
channel.description: Recent content in VAST News on VAST | Visualization and Analysis Software and Technology

item.title: UXarray ready for unstructured grids data analysis!
item.description: Project Raijin realizes the unstructured grids data recognition and analysis through our recently created, open-source, Python-based package, UXarray. We are thrilled to announce that UXarray has made its official debut in June, 2022 via Conda and PyPI releases.

item.title: Tactile representations of arctic sea ice data
item.description: Data visualizations are not the only way to communicate scientific insights; 3D printing & laser cutting offer an inclusive, hands-on way to share data. As part of a larger data visualization accessibility project, VAST researchers & educators are developing tactile data representations of arctic sea ice extant.

item.title: Visualizations of the recent, devastating Marshall fire
item.description: The most destructive wildfire in Colorado history was ignited on December 30, 2021 and spread quickly to neighborhoods in Superior and Louisville, driven by drought parched vegetation and winds gusting over 100 miles per hour.
